CSS_propertySyntax.summary: The syntax CSS descriptor is required when using the @property at-rule and describes the allowable syntax for the property.

remarks.para:
-CSS Properties and Values API
-CSS Painting API
-CSS Typed Object Model
-CSS Houdini

CSS_propertySyntax.value: A string with a supported syntax as defined by the specification. Supported syntaxes are a subset of CSS types. These may be used along, or a number of types can be used in combination.
